product_name: REI Knit Peruvian Hat - Toddler Boys'
long_description: With warm acrylic, the toddlers' REI Knit Peruvian hat keeps little boys' heads warm and toasty, whether they're walking in a winter wonderland or strolling down an leaf-covered sidewalk. Acrylic fabric provides dependable insulation and warmth without being itchy or uncomfortable. Soft sherpa fleece lining feels comfortable against the skin.
